name: task-sharing-bot
description: task sharing bot on CloudiaJS and mongoDB cores basis

scripts.webhook: curl https://api.telegram.org/bot$(grep BOT_TOKEN src/config/.env | cut -d '=' -f2)/setWebhook?url=$(grep WEBHOOK_URL src/config/.env | cut -d '=' -f2)
scripts.create: claudia create --region eu-west-2 --api-module src/bot --profile Magnifikate --role AWSLambdaBasicExecutionRole --configure-telegram-bot
scripts.deploy: claudia update --profile Magnifikate && npm run webhook

author: Magnifikate
